extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<IEventListener> listeners
      Array that holds all registered event listeners

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      EventHandler()
      Handles all listeners and waits for them to be called.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(IEventListener eventListener)

        public void removeListener(IEventListener eventListener)
        Removes a listener from the array.
        Parameters:
        eventListener - Listener to removed.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a listener from the array.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the listener to removed.

      • callEvent

        public void callEvent(User user,
             Packet packet)
        Calls all event listeners waiting for the given event.
        Parameters:
        user - Instance of the user the event came from.
        packet - The packet that was sent.

      • checkForUser

        private void checkForUser(User user,
                NEPacket packet)
        A filter that checks if the NEObject contains a key called "user". If it does it gets the localized user object and sets the key to it.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that sent the packet.
        packet - The packet sent.

      • getListeners

        private java.util.ArrayList<IEventListener> getListeners(java.lang.String name)
        Gets all listeners that are waiting for the given event.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the event that packets are waiting for.
        Returns:
        Returns all listeners waiting for the event.

      • clearAllListeners

        public void clearAllListeners()
        Removes all listeners
